name: New Art Academy
description:
New Art Academy is an educational game developed by Headstrong Games. It was originally released in 2012. Nintendo published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
New Art Academy is available on Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Keisuke Terasaki and Kensuke Tanabe. It was directed by Tancred Dyke-Wells. It was scored by James Hannigan and Masaru Tajima.
